profile_summary:
As a skilled Senior System Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in **DevOps**, **CI/CD**, and **Infrastructure as Code** methodologies, utilizing tools like **Ansible** and **Linux** for automation and efficient system management. My proficiency in **Python** enhances my ability to develop and optimize cloud solutions on **GCP**, and I have a solid understanding of **Networking** that supports enterprise-level infrastructure.
Additionally, my background in full stack development allows me to bridge the gap between development and operations, ensuring seamless collaboration and deployment. With experience in high-performance solutions across diverse sectors, I bring strong problem-solving skills and a commitment to compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. I am dedicated to leveraging technology to drive operational excellence and seamless system integration.
